abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews movie Life on the Line, directed by David Hackl and starring John Travolta.

headline.main: Review: ‘Life on the Line,’ a Plodding View of High-Wire Labor

snippet: John Travolta and Kate Bosworth star in a cliché-filled drama about the men who keep power transmission lines working....
lead_paragraph: John Travolta and Kate Bosworth star in a cliché-filled drama about the men who keep power transmission lines working.
